content: Please if you see some errors in the post aware me. FOR AVOID SPAM. PLEASE ONLY POST IF YOU GONNA PARTICIPATE. Thank you!|||| Sport-betting christmas-PL-prediction giveaway 2023 ||||Between 21th to 26th December I will arrange a small PL-prediction tournament with two small prizesParticipate with posting in the thread and using the code. Matches:21.12.2023 - Crystal Palace Â  Â  Â  Â - Brighton âœ…23.12.2023 - Liverpool Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  - Arsenal Â âœ…24.12.2023 - Wolves Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  - Chelsea âœ…26.12.2023 - Manchester Utd Â  Â  - Aston Villa âœ…Rules:Entries are accepted until one hour before the first match kicks off. 21.12.2023 Prizepool will be 0.001BTC. 1th Prize: 0.0006BTC & 2nd Prize: 0.0004BTC (If Bitcoin value increases or decreases a lot it will be Bitcoin for a value of $42, 60% 1th prize 40% 2nd prize).Only one bet per user. If you bet more then one time or with different accounts all your bets will be invalid.Your account level need to be at least Jr Member rank with 5 earned Merits and the account need to be older then 30 days.If it tied between participants it will be over time, and in over time we do the same process but with one new match. Predict the right result in four matches: Half time result, Full time result & over/under 2.5 goals after full time.You receive 1 point for each right prediction and you can get as most as 3 points for each match. Then when all matches is played you combine your total points and the one with most points wins.After the last match you will combine all your points to one result and that's your end score and the one with highest score wins.Two payout places 1th place & 2nd place.Minimum participants: 10. Maximum participants. No limit.If two or more users are on same points at the end it will be sudden death between those users. they have to guess what minute the first and last goal will be in the match between Everton - Manchester City 27th December.The winner will be presented 27/12.Â Â Leading board after one roundÂ Â Â  Â  Â  Â USER Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  ll Â  Â POINTS01. Sunderland Â  Â  Â  Â  ll Â  Â  Â  3+1+1+2 = 7 Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  02. GazetaBitcoin Â  Â  Â ll Â  Â  Â  3+0+2+2 = 703. Â paid2 Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  ll Â  Â  Â  2+0+2+2 04. 1miau Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â ll Â  Â  Â  1+1+1+2 Â  Â  Â  05. AHOYBRAUSE Â  Â  Â ll Â  Â  Â  2+0+1+1 06. mak013  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  ll Â  Â  Â  1+1+1+1 Â  Â 07 Danydee  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  ll Â  Â  Â  1+1+1+1 Â  Â 08. aliveNFT Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â ll Â  Â  Â  1+0+2+1 09. malaysiaboy Â  Â  Â  ll Â  Â  Â  1+0+1+2 Â  Â 10. entebah Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â ll Â  Â  Â  0+0+1+1 Â  Â  Â  11. CypherMonk Â  Â  Â  ll Â  Â  Â  0+0+1+2 Please if anyone see anything wrong, please inform me asap. Â I will update the table the morning after a match have been played. And sorry if the table look not good, but I am no pro in this things and doing my best.The user that end first when all matches have been played will win 0.0006BTC and the one that places second will win 0.0004BTCCongratulations to both GazetaBitcoin and Sunderland for ending on a shared first place and winning 0.0005BTC each.[/list]

comments.created_time: December 24, 2023, 06:26:54 AMLast edit: December 24, 2023, 06:47:31 AM by BabyBandit
comments.body: Round 2 updated.Very hard round yesterday many predicted wrong nobody had under in 2.5 goals and I understand it. Even I was shocked of the 1-1 result. But everything is still alive so we keep going and next match is already today! and now we have an alone leader in Sunderland and 1miau is making interest for the top. This is actually fun and thank you all for participates.And to: stingers You filled your answers to late so sorry it would not be fair to the others to include you know, but welcome next time. I assure you it will be more times with higher amounts in the prize pool.As always: If anyone see any mistakes please correct me.Thanks guys and Happy Holidays to you all love from BabyBandit.
